name: git-hooks-cli
description: Modern, type-safe git hooks manager for Node.js

scripts.build: vite build && tsc -p tsconfig.cli.json && node -e "try { require('fs').renameSync('bin/cli.js', 'bin/git-hooks.js') } catch(e) {}; try { require('fs').chmodSync('bin/git-hooks.js', '755') } catch(e) {}"
scripts.build:cli: tsc -p tsconfig.cli.json && node -e "try { require('fs').renameSync('bin/cli.js', 'bin/git-hooks.js') } catch(e) {}; try { require('fs').chmodSync('bin/git-hooks.js', '755') } catch(e) {}"
scripts.prepare: tsc -p tsconfig.cli.json && node -e "try { require('fs').renameSync('bin/cli.js', 'bin/git-hooks.js') } catch(e) {}; try { require('fs').chmodSync('bin/git-hooks.js', '755') } catch(e) {}" && node postinstall.js

author: Peter W.
